Detailed Description

Class representing an Internet Protocol address.

Currently only IPv4 addresses are supported.

Definition at line 63 of file IP.h.

Member Function Documentation

IP IP::fromString (  const MC2String &  ipAsString  )  throw ( MC2Exception ) [static]
 

Construct an IP from a string.

Converts a string in the format "a.b.c.d" where a, b, c and d is numbers from 0 too 255.

Parameters:
ipAsString The dotted decimal IP string.
Returns:
The IP for the input string or throws an exception if malformed IP.
